content.blockMath: \[\frac{\text{resistance of filament wire}}{\text{total resistance of connecting wires}} = 1000.\]

content.text: Use the information in (i) to explain qualitatively why the power dissipated in the filament wire of the lamp is greater than the total power dissipated in the connecting wires
